pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:0.2_0: The monks’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:0.5_0: The training rule on drinking alcohol
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:1.10_0: The tenth rule, the training rule on tenth rule, is finished.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:1.11_0: The third sub-chapter on arms akimbo is finished.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:1.2_0: At that time the monks from the group of six received almsfood in a heap. ...
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:1.3.1_0: “‘I will receive an even level of almsfood,’ this is how you should train.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:1.4_0: he should receive the almsfood on an even level.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:1.5_0: If a monk, out of disrespect, receives almsfood in a heap, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:1.7.4_0: They burn in times of trouble,
